DOC.brief_summary: In patient subtotal gastrectomy Billroth-I Billroth-II anastomosis , Anastomosis site stricture severe complication . It improve temporary scope cover metallic stent . It effective procedure stricture . But stent migration severe complication . Herein investigator suggest newly method prevent stent migration . Fixation stent hemoclip effective method prevent stent migration . But difficult remove stent resolve stricture . So investigators add suture hemoclip stent . And investigator cut suture stent removal .
DOC.brief_title: Covered Self-expandable Metallic Stents Insertion Using Clips Suture Materials Preventing Migration
DOC.criteria: subtotal gastrectomy BillrothI BillrothII anastomosis symptom gastric outlet obstruction anastomosis site stricture surgery patient impossible stent insertion due complication foreigner agree concent
